list.name: Changes
list.comment:
added GeneralUI as frontend for application
the frontend is now only on java output terminal

task.summary:
added an Interface for model Expense
no methods have configured to be inherited

added an Interface for model Expense
no methods have configured to be inherited

added an Interface for model Database
the appendExpense, getExpenditure, updateExpense, removeExpense methods was added
InternalStorage class was implemented for database backend It uses ArrayList to store data. the appendExpense, getExpenditure, updateExpense, removeExpense methods was added.

GeneralExpense class was implemented as model for expense
the model consists of id, amount, description, date along with constructors, getters and setters all other classes will use GeneralExpense as their default model for expense currently which needs to be updated in future

Added an IDatabase interface for Database Manipulation
The interface consists of essential methods for any Database manipulation: CRUD expenses appendExpense, getExpenditure, updateExpenses and removeExpenses Currently uses GeneralExpense as expense model

added InternalStorage class as Database Backend
The class implements ArrayList for storing Expenses appendExpense, getExpenditure, updateExpenses and removeExpenses Currently uses GeneralExpense as expense model

created file FileHandler for Database backend
The class is supposed to implement database using csv or similar files

added ExpenseHandler class for services related to Expense Objects
The service class will offer services to create GeneralExpense Objects Other services will be added

added ExpenseDatabaseService class for service related to Database manipulation
the service class will offer services to manipulate database

added GeneralUI as frontend for application
the frontend is now only on java output terminal

added GeneralUI as frontend for application
the frontend is now only on java output terminal
